com.google.appinventor.client.editor.simple.components
Interface FormChangeListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
YaFormEditor, YoungAndroidComponentSelectorPropertyEditor
public interface FormChangeListener

Listener interface for receiving form change events.

Classes interested in processing form change events implement this interface, and instances of that class are registered with a form, using the form's MockForm.addFormChangeListener(FormChangeListener) method.

Author:
lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney)

                                String propertyName,
                                String propertyValue)
Invoked when a component property is changed.

Parameters:
component - the component whose property was changed
propertyName - the name of the property
propertyValue - the value of the property

onComponentRemoved

void onComponentRemoved(MockComponent component,
                        boolean permanentlyDeleted)
Invoked when a component is removed.

Parameters:
component - the component that was removed
permanentlyDeleted - true if the component is being permanently deleted, false if the component is being moved from one container to another container

onComponentAdded

Invoked when a component is added.

Parameters:

onComponentRenamed

void onComponentRenamed(MockComponent component,
                        String oldName)
Invoked when a component is renamed.

Parameters:
component - the component that was renamed
oldName - the component's previous name

onComponentSelectionChange

void onComponentSelectionChange(MockComponent component,
                                boolean selected)
Invoked when a selection change of the form or of one of its components occurs.

Parameters:
component - the component that was selected or unselected
selected - true if the component is selected, false if it is unselected
